```{r}
library(data.table)

# plotting
library(ggplot2)
```

read data and explore

```{r}
# read data
data = fread("data_sim/results/data_intake_variance.csv")
# remove klepts from foragers and random
data = data[!(variable == "pc_intake_klepts" & 
                (sim_type %in% c("foragers", "random"))), ]
```

```{r}
# exploratory plot
ggplot(data[variable == "pc_intake_total"])+
  geom_boxplot(
    aes(factor(regrowth), var_value, 
        colour = sim_type)
  )
```
